title: Foundry registration?
content:
Every time I insert my four-letter-lowercase code (prgr) into a new typeface I feel like I should make another effort to register Paragraph. Over the past year I sent numerous emails to Microsoft Typography, followed all sorts of outdated links, supplied all sorts of info, emailed technical support, and in the end ended up where I started: [tsitebug@microsoft.com](mailto:tsitebug@microsoft.com), where as far as I can tell, nothing happens.  
How important is the registration, and does anyone still provide it?  
prgr ;-)
author: paragraph

comments.content: Oops - sorry about that - I found a mail from 2007. Sorry we didn't register you. Would be good to know what other methods failed - apart from the spam-filter it should be pretty reliable.
